name: Scene
desc: A part of an appâ€™s user interface with a life cycle managed by the system.

items.name: var body: Self.Body
items.desc: The content and behavior of the scene.

items.name: associatedtype Body : Scene
items.desc: The type of scene that represents the body of this scene.

items.name: func onChange<V>(of: V, perform: (V) -> Void) -> some Scene
items.desc: Adds an action to perform when the given value changes.

items.name: func handlesExternalEvents(matching: Set<String>) -> some Scene
items.desc: Specifies a modifier to indicate if this Scene can be used when creating a new Scene for the received External Event.

items.name: func defaultAppStorage(UserDefaults) -> some Scene
items.desc: The default store used by AppStorage contained within the scene and its view content.

items.name: func windowStyle<S>(S) -> some Scene
items.desc: Sets the style for windows created by this scene.

items.name: func windowToolbarStyle<S>(S) -> some Scene
items.desc: Sets the style for the toolbar defined within this scene.
